statements: SELECT * FROM solutions
SELECT title, category FROM solutions
SELECT description FROM solutions WHERE id = 1

SELECT id, title, description FROM solutions ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, title, category FROM solutions WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY category ASC, title ASC
